topic.title: EMS Injury Incident Description Section - conformance rules

section.p: Observations concerning a patient's injury mechanism

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11393 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.17"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67800-3" EMS Injury Incident Description Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10094)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "Injury Incident Description Section" (CONF:10914)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10916)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10917)
Conforms to Injury Cause Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.50)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10919)
Conforms to Injury Mechanism (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.51)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10921)
Conforms to Trauma Triage Criteria Steps1and2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.52)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10923)
Conforms to Trauma Triage Criteria Steps3and4 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.53)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10925)
Conforms to Vehicle Impact Area (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.54)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10927)
Conforms to Patient Location In Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.55)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10929)
Conforms to Vehicle Occupant Safety Equipment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.56)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10931)
Conforms to Airbag Deployment Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.57)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10933)
Conforms to Height Of Fall (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.58)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10935)
Conforms to Disaster Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.59)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67800-3" EMS Injury Incident Description Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10094)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "Injury Incident Description Section" (CONF:10914)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10916)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10917)
Conforms to Injury Cause Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.50)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10919)
Conforms to Injury Mechanism (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.51)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10921)
Conforms to Trauma Triage Criteria Steps1and2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.52)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10923)
Conforms to Trauma Triage Criteria Steps3and4 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.53)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10925)
Conforms to Vehicle Impact Area (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.54)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10927)
Conforms to Patient Location In Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.55)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10929)
Conforms to Vehicle Occupant Safety Equipment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.56)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10931)
Conforms to Airbag Deployment Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.57)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10933)
Conforms to Height Of Fall (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.58)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10935)
Conforms to Disaster Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.59)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.17"/> <code code="67800-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS Injury Incident Description Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>Injury Incident Description Section</title> <text/> </section>
